a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Drug use disorder deaths by age, World, 1990 to 2019
Estimated annual number of deaths from drug use disorders, classified by age.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: Illicit drugs are drugs that have been prohibited under international drug control treaties. They include opioids, cocaine,
